name: VRTGO
description: VRTGO is a truly immersive and creative platform for artists to tell their stories and invite their fans around the world to experience live performances and music videos like never before.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
